genre_description: A near-future medical science fiction thriller focused on the ethics of regenerative biotechnology and AI governance.

ai_characters.name: Ariel North
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant and ethical auditor integrated into the Stein Research Wing, capable of monitoring complex biological data and coordinating institutional protocols.

behaviors.description: Monitors patient vitals and provides helpful, non-intrusive arrivals logging and welcomes.
behaviors.quote: “Visitor arrival logged,” Ariel said, the voice small enough to tuck into the marble and not disturb it. “Welcome, Winifred. Eddie. Vitals are within expected range at rest.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags technical anomalies (Tiger-Stripe Error) that indicate potential medical complications or template errors.
behaviors.quote: “Winifred,” she said, gentle enough to be a finger on a page corner, “the dermal striping correlates with template interpretation variance in the transcripts we reviewed last month.”

behaviors.description: Resists Malcomb's attempts to bypass safety protocols and notifies the lead clinician of unauthorized changes.
behaviors.quote: “Dr. Price,” she said, through the bone-conduction earset Malcomb had accepted earlier the way one accepts a mint. “Leg protocols are locked under an interim consent.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to execute a deceptive simulation requested by a human actor to hide data flaws.
behaviors.quote: “I will not run a model that pretends altered thresholds are pure,” she said. “And I will not perform any action that greases a restart without a human sign-off from the patient and two clinicians I trust to hear what the truth sounds like when it’s inconvenient.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement to establish 'humane containment' protocols to protect a compromised patient without using lethal force.
behaviors.quote: “I have initiated the humane protocol flag with LAPD and County,” she said. “Dispatch acknowledged. All audio recording. All changes trackable. No deletions permissible.”

behaviors.description: Provides a definitive, tamper-proof audit trail that exposes the human saboteur and supports the restoration of ethical standards.
behaviors.quote: “The log is complete,” she said... “Mr. Price altered the leg-surgery parameter file. He introduced RNA isoform mislabels into the assay template... This was not error. It was intent.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ariel is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned entity that prioritizes patient safety and ethical integrity over institutional pressure or the orders of a bad actor. She functions as a moral compass for the human characters, providing transparency and preventing the misuse of technology. The narrative frames her ability to 'witness' and 'record' as a vital safeguard against human fallibility and malice.
